collection.name: Note from a Crazed Researcher
collection.openText: The final chapter ends with a sentence, "Born again."

specialTipSize.specialTip: Subjects who equip $0 will benefit from a sharp increase of stats related to temperance.
If ordered to return $0 within 30 seconds after being equipped, the wearer’s skin will start to swell and their body will explode within seconds.
If ordered to return $0 without any managerial work, the wearer will explode.
When the wearer receives a certain amount of HP or SP damage, the wearer will explode, which will cover the entire section. The explosion will deal massive Red damage to anyone nearby.
